meanings.definition: A cassette containing magnetic tape for recording and playing back sound.
meanings.sent1: I found an old audiocassette in the attic.
meanings.sent2: My dad used to listen to music on audiocassettes.
meanings.sent3: The audiocassette tried to sing along with the music.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were stored in her mind like an audiocassette.
meanings.sent5: The audiocassette clicked as it played, filling the room with music.

meanings.definition: To record or play back sound using an audiocassette.
meanings.sent1: I will audiocassette our conversation for later reference.
meanings.sent2: She loves to audiocassette her thoughts on tape.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to audiocassette the owner's voice.
meanings.sent4: His words audiocassette in my mind long after he left.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves audiocassetted a calming effect on her.
